name: section-scroll.js
description: Lightweight one page section scroll in vanilla JS

scripts.build: npx terser src/section-scroll.js --output dist/section-scroll.min.js --compress --mangle --comments "/@license.*/" --source-map "base='./src',includeSources,url='section-scroll.min.js.map'" && cp --force dist/* docs

author: Loh Ka Hong
